嘩.definition: clamor; noise; (bound form) sound used to call cats

嘩啦一聲.definition: with a crash; with a thunderous noise

嘩然.definition: in uproar; commotion; causing a storm of protest; tumultuous

嘩眾取寵.definition: sensationalism; vulgar claptrap to please the crowds; playing to the gallery; demagogy
